ygData.subject: Re: HARMSHIELD what lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: I had to research it, but had no problem at L20 making it w/ no practice. ... From: John & Heather Summers  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I had to research it, but had no problem at L20 making it w/ no practice.

----- Original Message -----
From: John & Heather Summers <dualdocs@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 1:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] HARMSHIELD what lvl?


> From: John & Heather Summers <dualdocs@...>
>
> Regarding Harmshield:
>
> I've seen this spell listed on level 20 spell lists several places but I
> have never seen it on a vendor. Is it research only? Is it better than
> banshee aura or shieldskin?
>
> Grymspine Mael'fesience
> Level 20 Necromancer
> Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> >From: "Skel the Necromancer" <mata_eq@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com

> >
> >From: "Skel the Necromancer" <mata_eq@...>
> >
> >do you need a component to cast it? Cus I put it in my spell slot but
it
> >stays grey like I had just cast it! what is up w/ that?
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: <TkAdam@...>
> >To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>

> >Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] HARMSHIELD what lvl?
> >

> > >

> > > mata_eq@... writes:
> > >
> > > > Can anyone tell me what is a good use for harmshield? Can I cast
> >after
> >I
> > > > cast this spell?
> > >
> > > Running away. It gives you 18 seconds to run :) No you cannot cast
> >while
> >it
> > > is up.
> > >
